Class Troops

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Troops
  • public abstract class Troops
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Troops are the the basic units in the simulation, some have special abilities or specialized stats all use a basic targeting AI to shoot at the enemy team
    Version:
    April 2020
    Author:
    Howard Yang, Roy Sun, Stanley Wang
